description: A JavaScript module defining a LightningJS component 'RecipeCard' with a template, properties, state, hooks, and input handler for rendering and interacting with a recipe card UI element.

classes.name: RecipeCard
classes.description: A LightningJS UI component representing a recipe card with visual layout, styling, and interactivity.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Initializes component state with data from 'recipe' property when component is ready.

methods.name: focus
methods.description: Handles focus event by setting focus alpha for visual feedback.

methods.name: unfocus
methods.description: Handles unfocus event by resetting focus alpha.

methods.name: enter
methods.description: Handles enter input; invokes 'onOpen' callback with recipe data if provided.
